trans-unit.source: Managing your Azure MFA settings
trans-unit.target: Managing your Azure MFA settings

trans-unit.source: This document will provide users information on where they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.
trans-unit.target: This document will provide users information on where they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.

trans-unit.source: Changing your settings with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Changing your settings with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: The following information is provided to help you manage your multi-factor authentication settings.
trans-unit.target: The following information is provided to help you manage your multi-factor authentication settings.

trans-unit.source: Changing your settings depends on how you use multi-factor authentication
trans-unit.target: Changing your settings depends on how you use multi-factor authentication

trans-unit.source: There are several different places you can go to change your multi-factor authentication settings.
trans-unit.target: There are several different places you can go to change your multi-factor authentication settings.

trans-unit.source: Where you go depends on how you are using multi-factor authentication.
trans-unit.target: Where you go depends on how you are using multi-factor authentication.

trans-unit.source: Choose the one that best describes you.
trans-unit.target: Choose the one that best describes you.

trans-unit.source: How you use multi-factor authentiation
trans-unit.target: How you use multi-factor authentiation

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>I use it with Office 365</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>I use it with Office 365</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: This means that you will want to change your settings through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: This means that you will want to change your settings through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>I don't know</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>I don't know</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: This means you will want to sign-in to <link><linkText>http://myapps.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link> and change your setting here.
trans-unit.target: This means you will want to sign-in to <link><linkText>http://myapps.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link> and change your setting here.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>I use it with Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>I use it with Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: This means that you will want to change your settings through the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This means that you will want to change your settings through the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Changing your settings with Office 365
trans-unit.target: Changing your settings with Office 365

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: To change your settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: To change your settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: Log on to the <link><linkText>Office 365 portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the <link><linkText>Office 365 portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In the top right corner select the widget and choose Office 365 Settings.
trans-unit.target: In the top right corner select the widget and choose Office 365 Settings.

trans-unit.source: Click on Additional security verification.
trans-unit.target: Click on Additional security verification.

trans-unit.source: On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security.
trans-unit.target: On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the page that will allow you to change your settings.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the page that will allow you to change your settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Changing your settings with the Myapps portal
trans-unit.target: Changing your settings with the Myapps portal

trans-unit.source: If you are not sure how you use multi-factor authentication, then you can always change your settings through the myapps portal.
trans-unit.target: If you are not sure how you use multi-factor authentication, then you can always change your settings through the myapps portal.

trans-unit.source: To change your settings in the Myapps portal
trans-unit.target: To change your settings in the Myapps portal

trans-unit.source: Sign-in to <link><linkText>https://myapps.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Sign-in to <link><linkText>https://myapps.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: At the top, select profile.
trans-unit.target: At the top, select profile.

trans-unit.source: Select Additional Security Verification.
trans-unit.target: Select Additional Security Verification.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the page that will allow you to change your settings.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the page that will allow you to change your settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Changing your settings with Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Changing your settings with Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Azure you will want to change your settings through the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Azure you will want to change your settings through the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: To access additional security verification settings in the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: To access additional security verification settings in the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Log on to the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the Azure portal, click on your username.
trans-unit.target: At the top of the Azure portal, click on your username.

trans-unit.source: This will bring up a drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: This will bring up a drop-down box.

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down box, select Additional security verification.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down box, select Additional security verification.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the page that will allow you to change your settings.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the page that will allow you to change your settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
